fields.Title: Metabolic Syndrome One-pagers
fields.Description/Abstract: An interactive educational series of one-page (two sided) documents designed to provide participants with the basic information regarding the various aspects of metabolic syndrome and its management, to generate thought and discussion, and to serve as a visual reminder of their commitment to change and health management.  (5 A Day, Abdominal Obesity, Dietary Approach to Stop Hypertension, Dyslipidemia, FITT, Food Labels, Getting Started with Physical Activity I & II, Healthy Diet, Hypertension, Insulin Resistance, Mediterranean Diet, Nutrients: Carbohydrates, Nutrients: Lipids, Nutrients: Micronutrients, Nutrients: Protein, Nutrients: Supplements, OPS, Physical Activity Pyramid, Portion Control, Weight Management, What is Metabolic Syndrome).
